conversation: Chao ban, Minh ten la Li Li. Minh co the giup gi cho ban?
Ao nay co bao nhieu size?
Ao co 3 size: S, M, L
Bo nay co bao nhieu mau?
Bo co 3 loai mau chinh: do, xanh, den
Shop co cua hang offline khong?
Hien tai shop chi ban hang offline
Co duoc kiem tra hang truoc khi tra tien khong?
Hien tai shop minh chua co chinh sach nay
Mua hang khong vua y thi co the doi tra lai?
Cua hang co chinh sach doi hang neu san pham co dau hieu hu hong
Cua hang co the thanh vien khong?
Hien tai cua hang chua co chinh sach thanh vien. Nhung se co voucher cho nhung ban nao mua hang tren 1 trieu dong!
